name: Swinging Monkey - Swing Through The Heat Of The Jungle As Far As The Baboon Can!
name_original: Swinging Monkey - Swing Through The Heat Of The Jungle As Far As The Baboon Can!
description:
Monkey on a mission! Get that monkey swinging through the trees! Help him by tilting as you play! See the monkey nearly fly apart as he whips through the air on his vine. But watch out, don’t let him hit the ground or else, its GAME OVER!!

How far can you go? Of course, you can get FARTHER by grabbing a passing bird! But be careful -- sometimes, the birds are just going to fly you back to the start and it’s all over!!

Only got 30 seconds? Pick the 30 game and see how far you get! Got a minute? There you go! Got lots of time on your hands? Check out the Shop for unlimited time to play! Plus more more characters and more jungles funky jungles!

Help this Monkey swing through the jungle!

» Beautiful graphics!
» Cooool sounds!
» Different characters (monkeys, of course!)!
» Different jungles to enhance your game play experience!
» Different ropes that match your mood and style!
» PLUS UNLIMITED TILTING FUN!!!

Note: This app contains the ability to purchase optional content using real money. If you don't want this feature, disable payment features in your device in-app purchases settings.

If you love this game, please support it by leaving a review in the app store. Thanks for your help we really appreciate it!
